description: dark blue; tapering sleeves; front, arms and sides stitched in multicolored threads with organic and geometric patterns embellished with gold sequins and metallic gold threads; pennant-like elements on stomach; vertical embroidered bands of various styles on each side on back; front placket of orange and yellow silk; two shell fragments and orange bead on PL side above pennant-like shape; shell fragment and bead on PL sleeve
medium: Cotton, sequins, silk, shells, bead; needlework
title: Dress
